Package uk.ac.wlv.percs

Parliamentary Election Results Communication System (PERCS).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Response
    This interface supplies method to be overridden by class implementing corresponding response to XML message
    ValidatorI<T>
    Each different validator has to implement this interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientRequest1
    Class matching client's XML message
    ClientRequest2
    Class matching client's XML message
    ClientRequest3
    Class matching client's XML message
    ClientRequest4
    Class matching client's XML message
    CommunicationEndpoint
    Immutable message providing socket.
    CommunicationLog
    This class implements custom communication logger
    Connection
    This actor is at the root of this system.
    EmptyResponse
    Class matching server's response to client's message
    InfoTool
    Helper class.
    InvalidRequest
    Class matching client's XML message
    Listener
    This class provides actor listening for new clients.
    PercsServer
    Main class.
    PoorRequest
    Class matching server's response to client's message
    Protocol
    Class storing protocol.
    Request
    Each message in the form of XML is translated to a class implementing this interface.
    Server
    The singleton class encapsulating all the necessary initialisations.
    ServerResponse1
    Class matching server's response to client's request
    ServerResponse2
    Class matching server's response to client's message
    ServerResponse3
    Class matching server's response to client's message
    StreamHandler
    This stream handler, should be fairly versatile, in terms of what kind of user input it can process.
    StreamHandlerWithBehaviour
    This stream handler, should be fairly versatile, in terms of what kind of user input it can process.
    StreamHandlerWithBehaviour.ConnectionClosed
    Placeholder message
    StreamHandlerWithBehaviour.Received
    Placeholder message
    Terminator
    This actor observes top parent and shuts down system upon receiving Terminated message
    Validator
    Class validating stream according to supplied protocol's request/response pairs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClosingProblem
    Internal exception
    ReadingProblem
    Internal exception
